title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Demographic, and Share of respondents in each Demographic on the y axis.
Boys is higher than any other categories with value 34.0, followed by Mixed, and KS2. Down to category KS5 with the lowest value of 14.4.
The highest value at Boys is almost 2.36 times larger than the minimum value of KS5.
